text.title: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac

head.s: Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac

p.s: This wikiHow teaches you how to post private videos to YouTube on PC or Mac .
When you post a private video on YouTube , it does not appear in any search results , or on your channel .
Comments are not allowed , and only those you share the video with can view the video .
You can select to upload the video as private on the same web page you upload videos from .

item.s:
Go to
https://www.youtube.com
in a web browser .
You can use any web browser or your choice on PC or Mac .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 1 Version 2.jpg

item.s:
If you are not already signed into YouTube , click
Sign In
in the upper-right corner and sign in with the email address and password associated with your YouTube/Google account .
Click on your profile picture in the upper right corner of the screen .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 2 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Select YouTube Studio ( beta ) from the drop down menu .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 3 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click .
You should see this button in the middle of the screen .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 4 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click the drop-down menu that says .
It 's below the upload icon in the center of the screen .
This drop-down menu allows you to select different privacy options for the video you are about to upload .
By default , videos you upload are set to Public .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 5 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Select .
It 's the third option in the drop-down menu .
This sets the uploaded video to Private .
This means that only people you invite to view the video can view it .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 6 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click .
It 's the icon with an arrow pointing up .
It 's above the drop-down menu .
This opens a file browser you can use to browse for video files on your computer .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 7 Version 2.jpg

item.s: You can also drag and drop video files to the upload icon .
Select a video and click .
Use the file browser to navigate to the video you want to upload .

When you find it , click on it and then click
Open
in the lower-right corner to begin uploading it to YouTube .
This takes you to another screen that informs you of the processing progress .
You can also edit the details of the video while it is processing .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 8 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Type a name for the video ( optional ) .
YouTube automatically names new videos after the file name .
If you want to change the video title , delete the file name in the first box and type your own name for the video .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 9 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Type a description for the video ( optional ) .
If you wish to add a description of the video , type it in the large box labeled description .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 10 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click ( Optional ) .

If you want to share the video with specific users , click
Share
below the drop-down menu that says " Private " on the right .
This displays a pop-up allows you to share the video with users .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 11 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Type the email addresses of users and click .
If you are sharing the video with specific users , type the email address associated with their YouTube account .

Then click the blue button that says
Ok
.

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 12 Version 2.jpg

item.s: You can only share a private video with users that have a YouTube account .
Click .
This option is available once the video is finished processing .
It 's the blue button in the upper-right corner .
This uploads the video as private .
Only you and other people you share the video with can view the video .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 13 Version 2.jpg

item.s:
Go to
https://www.youtube.com
in a web browser .
You can use any web browser or your choice on PC or Mac .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 14 Version 2.jpg

item.s:
If you are not already signed into YouTube , click
Sign In
in the upper-right corner and sign in with the email address and password associated with your YouTube/Google account .
Click your profile icon .
Your profile icon is the image you selected for your Google account .
It 's in the upper-right corner of the screen .
This displays your profile menu .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 15 Version 2.jpg

item.s: If you have not selected a profile picture for your Google account , your profile displays a colored circle with your initial .
Click .
It 's near the top of the profile menu .
It 's next to an icon that resembles a gear .
This opens the Creator Studio , which allows you to edit video .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 16 Version 2.jpg

item.s:
If " YouTube Studio ( Beta ) " appears in your profile menu , instead of Creator Studio , click
YouTube Studio ( Beta )
in the profile menu , and then click
Creator Studio Classic
in the sidebar to the left .
Sharing Private videos is not yet available in YouTube Studio .
Click .
It 's in the sidebar to the left .
This displays a list of all your uploaded videos .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 17 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click below the video you want to share .
The edit button is below each video in the list .
This opens the Edit Video menu in Creator Studio .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 18 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click .
It 's on the right side of the screen below the drop-down menu that says " Private " .
This displays a pop-up that allows you to add users you want to share the video with .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 19 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Type the email addresses of YouTube users .
Use the box to type the email address associated with any YouTube users you want to share the video with .
The user must have a YouTube account in order to be able to view a video set to private .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 20 Version 2.jpg

item.s: Click .
This sends an email invite to the user to notify them you have shared a video with them .

figure.rend: Post Private Videos on YouTube on PC or Mac Step 21 Version 2.jpg
